mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from St. Luke's Health is tailored to your profile. With hospitalization coverage and outpatient services, it provides comprehensive care for managing hypertension. At an affordable monthly premium of $300, it offers a balance between coverage and financial considerations suitable for upper-middle income individuals. The high coverage limit of $500,000 and moderate maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6,500 help ensure you're protected without unnecessary financial burden.
